oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Keep 'em flying!
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This poster reads ""Keep 'em Flying"" in large blue letters. In small print at the bottom of the poster is written ""Presented by the United States Army Recruiting Service.""
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States Army Recruiting Service
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945
